content: I'm excited to try out these recipes and experiment with different types of bread. Since I've baked at least twice a week, I'm confident that I can adapt to the process and create some delicious ciabatta and baguette using my sourdough starter. One question I have is, what are some common mistakes to avoid when working with sourdough starters and bread-making in general? Are there any specific tips or precautions I should take to ensure success?
